amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds in the bill to transfer funds made available by the bill for fire preparedness activities to the Wildland Fire Management appropriation for fire suppression activities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 23 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds in the bill to transfer funds made available by the bill for fire preparedness activities to the Wildland Fire Management appropriation for fire suppression activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A080) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A080) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A080) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
